name: jestrunner.configPath
desc: Jest config path (relative to `${workspaceFolder}` e.g. jest-config.json)

name: jestrunner.jestPath
desc: Absolute path to jest bin file (e.g. /usr/lib/node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js)

name: jestrunner.debugOptions
desc: Add or overwrite vscode debug configurations (only in debug mode) (e.g. { "args": ["--no-cache"] })

name: jestrunner.runOptions
desc: Add CLI Options to the Jest Command e.g. https://jestjs.io/docs/en/cli

name: jestrunner.jestCommand
desc: Define an alternative Jest command (e.g. for Create React App and similar abstractions)

name: jestrunner.runInExternalNativeTerminal
desc: Run jest runner in external native terminal. Disabled on debug mode

name: jestrunner.codeLens
desc: Enable desired codeLens, possible value : 'run', 'debug', 'watch', 'coverage'. Defaults to ['run', 'debug']

name: jestrunner.codeLensSelector
desc: CodeLens will be shown on files matching this pattern

name: jestrunner.enableYarnPnpSupport
desc: Enable if you are using Yarn 2 with Plug'n'Play

name: jestrunner.changeDirectoryToWorkspaceRoot
desc:
Changes directory before execution. The fallback order is:
1. `jestrunner.projectPath`
2. the nearest `package.json`
3. `${workspaceFolder}`

name: jestrunner.preserveEditorFocus
desc: Preserve focus on editor when running tests
